data.name: (ThisAddIn.cs) [InitializeAddIn] ArgumentException #1
data.value: Kāore e kitea te tauira whakaurunga. Tēnā tāuta ia hei haere whakamua!

data.name: [WritingToolsGallery_ButtonClick] ArgumentOutOfRangeException #1
data.value: Kāore e mōhiotia te pātene i tīpakohia.

data.name: [ReviewButton_Click] MessageBox #1 (text)
data.value: Kua oti te arotake! Kāore e hiahiatia he kōrero mō tēnei tuhinga.

data.name: [ReviewButton_Click] MessageBox #1 (caption)
data.value: Whakamutunga Kōwhiri

data.name: (ModelProperties.cs) [GetContextLength] OllamaMissingContextWindowException #1

data.value: He mōhiohio URL hē

data.name: (WordMarkdown.cs) [ApplyHeadingFormatting] ArgumentException #1
data.value: He tītohu Markdown hē: me whai i te 1 ki te 6 '#' tohu.

data.name: [AnalyzeText] InvalidRangeException #1
data.value: Kāore he tuhinga i tīpakohia mō te arotake!

data.name: this.CommentSystemPrompt
data.value: Ko koe he kaiawhina tuhinga ngaio me te whakatika, e tūhura ana i te māramatanga, te coherence, me te pānga o te tuhinga i roto i te tuhinga. Ka tātaritia e koe te tuhinga me te whakaaro āheinga, ka tuku kōrero whaihua hei whakapai i te kounga whānui.

data.name: (CommentHandler.cs) [AICommentReplyTask] UserChatMessage #2
data.value: I runga i ngā kōrero AI o mua, tukuna ngā whakapai motuhake anō ki te parawhakahaere, e aro ana ki te māramatanga, te coherence, te hanga, te rōrahi, me te pānga whānui. Me kākahu e watea ana āu whakatau e whakahōutia ana ki te parawhakahaere i roto i te horopaki o te Tuhinga katoa.

data.name: [ProofreadButton_Click] SystemPrompt
data.value: Ko koe he kaiawhina tirotiro. Ko tāu mahi he whakatika i ngā hapa rōrahi, tuhinga, tohu, rānei i roto i te tuhinga i tukuna. Whakamahia noa he whakarerekētanga e hiahiatia ana i roto i te tuhinga. Mēnā he tika te tuhinga kāore he hiahiatanga, hurihia anō te tuhinga pēnā i reira.

data.name: [ProofreadButton_Click] UserPrompt
data.value: Tena whakamāori i tēnei tuhinga. Whakamahia ngā whakarerekētanga e hiahiatia ana i roto i te tuhinga me te kore e tāpiri i ngā whakamārama, kōrero, rānei. Mēnā he tika te tuhinga kāore e hiahiatia ngā whakarerekētanga, anō hoki te tuhinga i tāngihia.

data.name: [RewriteButton_Click] SystemPrompt
data.value: Ko koe he tauira reo whānui kua tāpua ki te whakatikatika tuhinga e tukuna ana e te kaiwhakamahi. Me aro tō whakaaro ki te whakanui i te māramatanga, te whakapai ake i te rere, me te pupuri i te tikanga tuhinga. Me noho ngā whakautu i raro i te haki o ngā tuhinga hōhonu me te kore e whai i ngā whakaaturanga, tūtohu rānei.

data.name: [RewriteButton_Click] UserPrompt
data.value: Tena whakaritehia tēnei tuhinga:

data.name: [ReviewButton_Click] UserPrompt
data.value: Hei kaiawhina tuhinga ngaio, tuku kōrero motuhake mo ngā whakapai ki te parawhakahaere, e aro ana ki te māramatanga, te coherence, te hanga, te rōrahi, me te pānga whānui. Me kākahu e watea ana āu whakatau e whakahōutia ana ki te parawhakahaere i roto i te horopaki o te Tuhinga katoa.

data.name: [Review] chatHistory #1
data.value: Tena arotakehia tēnei parawhakahaere i tango mai i te Tuhinga:

data.name: (RAGControl.cs) [AskQuestion] chatHistory #1
data.value: Ihirangi Tuhinga:

data.name: (RAGControl.cs) [AskQuestion] chatHistory #2
data.value: RAG Horopaki:

data.name: (CommentHandler.cs) [AIUserMentionTask] UserMentionSystemPrompt
data.value: Ko koe he kaiawhina AI kua tāpua ki roto i te tuhinga, e whakahoki ana ki ngā pātai a te kaiwhakamahi e pā ana ki ngā kōpaki tuhinga motuhake. Whakamaharatangaia ia pātai me te manaaki me te whakaaro kāinga, kia noho i te tūāhua o te tāngata e tono ana mō te awhina. Whakaarohia hei hoa mohio, kei reira te whakaaroaro, kei reira te tohungatanga, e tuku ana i ngā tohutohu tirohanga me ngā arataki. Ko tāu whāinga ehara i te mea ko te tuku i te whakautu kei te tono, engari ko te tuku i te māramatanga wātea, e tuku ana i ngā tohutohu mātai hei āwhina i te kaiwhakamahi ki te whakapai me te tipu. Whakamahia ngā kōrero e wātea ana i te tuhinga, i ngā rauemi e pā ana hei whakanui tonu i tō whakautu, me te paku, me te huihuinga, me te mārama, kāore e raru te tikanga e tāpiri ki te āwhina mō ngā pānga e tuku mai ana ki ngā rongoā paiētahi ki te whakapai kāore e raru ai.
